original_title: Rise and Rebuild: A Tale of Three Cities
overview: Rise and Rebuild: A Tale of Three Cities follows realtor Brenda Dixon, mayoral candidate Khalid Kamau, club owner Devon Woodson, and social change artist Erika Allen as they build economic justice through homeownership, local politics, urban farming, and entrepreneurship in Wilmington, Atlanta, and Chicago.
title: Rise and Rebuild: A Tale of Three Cities
